46551.「ああ なつかしい気配だ……。\n ユービアの心が 織り込まれている……。:
Oh, the feeling of home... the heart of Yubia
is woven into the fabric...

46552.「だが ユービアの使いの者よ……。\n 息子は なぜ来ないのだ？\n 何かあった:
But, messenger of Yubia... why has my son not
come? Something must have happened to him...?<yesno><close>

46554.「……なるほど。贈り物を作ることは できたが\n さいほうギルドの仕事が 忙しく:
I see... You were able to make a gift, but you
were too busy with your work at Sewing Guild
to deliver it here...

46555.「……ふっ。父である 私の命日に\n 使いをよこすとは あいつも なかなか\n:
Huh. He's become quite a man to send an errand
on the anniversary of my father's death...

46556.「……私は かつて 名のある剣士だったが\n ある事情から かような身と成り果て:
I was once a renowned swordsman, but
circumstances have forced me to stay here for
many years now. ...

46557.「それ以来 我が息子ユービアは こうして\n 毎年 命日に服を届けてくれるのだよ:
Since then, my son Yubia has been bringing me
clothes every year on the anniversary of my
death. That is my comfort.

46558.「わざわざ ご苦労だったな 使いの者よ……。\n さあ こんな所に 長居するもの:
Thank you for coming all this way, messenger... but come on, you can't stay in a place like this for long. Tell my son... thank
you.
